## GatedConfig interface

Configuration of the basic information that will be added to the ERC721 NFT

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GatedConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [animationHash](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.animationhash.md) | BytesLike | The hash of the NFT animation |
|  [animationUrl](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.animationurl.md) | string | An animation url of the NFT |
|  [description](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.description.md) | string | Description that will contain the GatedNFT |
|  [imageHash](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.imagehash.md) | BytesLike | The hash of the NFT image |
|  [imageUrl](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.imageurl.md) | string | An image url of the NFT |
|  [name](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.name.md) | string | Name of the token as defined by Open Zeppelin ERC721 |
|  [symbol](./rain-sdk.gatedconfig.symbol.md) | string | Symbol of the token as defined by Open Zeppelin ERC721 |
